member.name: M:LNSF.Api.Controllers.AccountController.Get(LNSF.Domain.Filters.AccountFilter)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of accounts based on the provided filter.

member.summary: Gets the count of accounts.

member.summary: Gets an account by UserName.

member.summary: Creates a new account.

member.name: M:LNSF.Api.Controllers.AccountController.Put(LNSF.Api.ViewModels.AccountPutViewModel)
member.summary: Updates an account (UserName or Role). Note: do not update your password.

member.summary: Updates the password of an account.

member.name: M:LNSF.Api.Controllers.AccountController.Delete(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes an account by ID.

member.summary: Authenticates a user and returns an authentication token.

member.summary: Refreshes an authentication token.
